name: Racing Ridge: Huckleberry Hills
description:
Racing Ridge is a 3D game where you complete the Huckleberry bills racing track.

It might be a bit hard  but you respawn where you die.

Headphones Recommended!

Made in Scratch

>>>Programs used

Scratch: Game Logic

Blender: Design

Paint: VFX

Music by Warflame

Tell your score in the comments!

This is a DODGING game!

SFX by me.
